key_risks: Environmental impact and regulatory compliance challenges
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global operations
Legal disputes, including a $40 million lawsuit
Competitive pressures in the maintenance and cleaning products market
controversies: $40 million lawsuit by IQ Products alleging repudiation of a licensing agreement and product safety concerns
environmental_issues: Scrutiny over environmental impact of products and manufacturing processes
Need for compliance with diverse regulatory requirements across markets
social_issues: Community engagement and corporate responsibility initiatives
governance_issues: Questions raised about corporate governance due to the lawsuit
Potential reputational risks from legal disputes

sources.title: WD-40 Company Releases 2022 Environmental, Social and Governance Report
sources.snippet: WD-40 Company (NASDAQ:WDFC) today released its 2022 Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) Report titled Building a Business for the Future . sources.title: $40 Million Complaint Against WD-40 Co. - Courthouse News Service
